episode_event_general_lusamine_family/67:
Hey! We’ve been looking all over for you.
Got a favor to ask.

Lillie went and entered us into this family battle
competition that’s coming up soon...

But we don’t really have any experience battling
together as a team, you see.

We were hoping you could introduce us to a
good instructor who could show us the ropes.

I want us to be able to show our full power in
the competition as a family—me, my brother,
and our mother, all together!
episode_event_general_lusamine_family/68:
Together as a family,
with my dearest Lillie
and Gladion...

Hmph. I never thought I’d end up on a team
with you two.

But this will be such a good opportunity for us to
show our bond as a family!

Yeah! Let’s train hard so we can show the
competition the full power of our family!
episode_event_general_lusamine_family/64:
If you see a path in front of
you, take it! The further you go,
the stronger you become!
episode_event_general_lusamine_family/65:
Now that’s full power! No one
could call you lily-livered,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
